mapper.sql: ID, SUMMONER_ID, QUEUE, POSITION, SUMMONER_NAME, LEAGUE_ID, LEAGUE_NAME, TIER, 'RANK', LEAGUE_POINTS, WINS, LOSSES, VETERAN, INACTIVE, FRESH_BLOOD, HOT_STREAK, SERIES_TARGET, SERIES_WINS, SERIES_LOSSES
mapper.insert: insert into l_position (ID, SUMMONER_ID, QUEUE, POSITION, SUMMONER_NAME, LEAGUE_ID, LEAGUE_NAME, TIER, DIVISION, LEAGUE_POINTS, WINS, LOSSES, VETERAN, INACTIVE, FRESH_BLOOD, HOT_STREAK, SERIES_TARGET, SERIES_WINS, SERIES_LOSSES) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{summonerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{queue,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{position,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{summonerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leagueId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leagueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tier,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{rank,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{leaguePoints,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wins,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{losses,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{veteran,jdbcType=BIT}, #{inactive,jdbcType=BIT}, #{freshBlood,jdbcType=BIT}, #{hotStreak,jdbcType=BIT}, #{seriesTarget,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{seriesWins,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{seriesLosses,jdbcType=INTEGER})

INSERT INTO l_position (SUMMONER_ID, QUEUE, POSITION, SUMMONER_NAME, LEAGUE_ID, LEAGUE_NAME, TIER, DIVISION, LEAGUE_POINTS, WINS, LOSSES, VETERAN, INACTIVE, FRESH_BLOOD, HOT_STREAK, SERIES_TARGET, SERIES_WINS, SERIES_LOSSES) VALUES
(#{item.summonerId}, #{item.queue}, #{item.position}, #{item.summonerName}, #{item.leagueId}, #{item.leagueName}, #{item.tier}, #{item.rank}, #{item.leaguePoints}, #{item.wins}, #{item.losses}, #{item.veteran}, #{item.inactive}, #{item.freshBlood}, #{item.hotStreak}, #{item.seriesTarget}, #{item.seriesWins}, #{item.seriesLosses})
mapper.update:
update l_position
SUMMONER_ID = #{summonerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUEUE = #{queue},
POSITION = #{position},
SUMMONER_NAME = #{summonerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEAGUE_ID = #{leagueId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEAGUE_NAME = #{leagueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TIER = #{tier},
RANK = #{rank},
LEAGUE_POINTS = #{leaguePoints},
WINS = #{wins},
LOSSES = #{losses},
VETERAN = #{veteran},
INACTIVE = #{inactive},
FRESH_BLOOD = #{freshBlood},
HOT_STREAK = #{hotStreak},
SERIES_TARGET = #{seriesTarget},
SERIES_WINS = #{seriesWins},
SERIES_LOSSES = #{seriesLosses},
where ID = #{id}

update l_position set SUMMONER_ID = #{summonerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUEUE = #{queue}, POSITION = #{position}, SUMMONER_NAME = #{summonerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEAGUE_ID = #{leagueId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEAGUE_NAME = #{leagueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIER = #{tier}, DIVISION = #{rank}, LEAGUE_POINTS = #{leaguePoints}, WINS = #{wins}, LOSSES = #{losses}, VETERAN = #{veteran}, INACTIVE = #{inactive}, FRESH_BLOOD = #{freshBlood}, HOT_STREAK = #{hotStreak}, SERIES_TARGET = #{seriesTarget}, SERIES_WINS = #{seriesWins}, SERIES_LOSSES = #{seriesLosses} where ID = #{id}
